code: import axios from"axios";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const List=()=>{const[postList,setPostList]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.post("/api/post/list").then(res=>{if(res.data.success){setPostList([...res.data.postList]);}}).catch(err=>console.log(err));},[postList]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list__page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uAC8C\uC2DC\uAE00 \uB9AC\uC2A4\uD2B8"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list__wrap",children:postList.map((list,key)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cate",children:"\uAD50\uC721 "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/detail/".concat(list.postNum),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("em",{children:[list.postNum,": "]}),list.title]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"content",children:list.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth",children:"\uAE00\uC4F4\uC774"})]},key))})]});};export default List;
